data.name: FOG
data.detailed_description: Your new indie rouge-lite addiction. Battle through the nine levels of hell in a psychedelic watercolor painted world. Unleash your creativity to create a character build that will take you all the way to the gates of heaven. Pick one of nine weapons, pick one of three spells, and pick one of five elemental damage types. When you die and go back to the first level, come back stronger with the gear and experience points you earn. Even if you win once, there are always new character builds to try and gear to optimize. Connect to the official server for online player vs. player combat. New weapons and spells coming soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
